author: nc1234
content:
<@363800010518822915> <@845691100072509460> Is there anyway for Prysm to go to eip7805 from electra and skip fulu? I tried 
```
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  eip7805_fork_epoch: 2
```
and prysm stalls when transitioning from deneb to electra

author: nc1234
content:
```
electra_fork_epoch: 1
fulu_fork_epoch: 2
eip7805_fork_epoch: 3
```
works fine, just want to see if it can skip an epoch to facilitate testing

author: terencechain
content: Yes we could. That's a good feedback and we already do this for eip7732 (thanks to <@755590043632140352> ) I can cherry pick his fixes to our focil branch. Unless it's already merged to develop
